class.name: X509Certificate
class.description: The X509Certificate class represents an X509 certificate. Certificates can be loaded and saved like any other [Resource]. They can be used as the server certificate in [method StreamPeerSSL.accept_stream] (along with the proper [CryptoKey]), and to specify the only certificate that should be accepted when connecting to an SSL server via [method StreamPeerSSL.connect_to_stream]. [b]Note:[/b] Not available in HTML5 exports.

method.name: load_from_string
method.description: Loads a certificate from a [code]string[/code] (in PEM format).

method.name: save
method.description: Saves a certificate to the given [code]path[/code] (should be a "*.crt" file).

method.name: save_to_string
method.description: Saves a certificate to a string (in PEM format).
